text: Argiles et Grès à Reptiles Formation, also known as the Argiles Rutilantes FormationTabuce et al., 2013 is an early MaastrichtianWeishampel et al., 2004, pp.588-593 French geologic formation in the département of Var preserving the remains of several types of dinosaurs and other extinct organisms.Argiles et Grès à Reptiles Formation at Fossilworks.org == Fossil content == An abelisaurid similar to Arcovenator is known from Département des Bouches-du- Rhone, while enantiornithean and indeterminate avialan remains are known from Département du Var. === Dinosaurs === {| class="wikitable" align="center" |- ! colspan="7" align="center" | Dinosaurs of the Grès à Reptiles |- !
